verses.verse: Then <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H5011>Nob<s%> to <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>: and <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> was <S%H2729>afraid<s%> at the <S%H7125>meeting<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Why art thou alone, and no <S%H376>man<s%> with thee?

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, The <S%H4428>king<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me a <S%H1697>business<s%>, and hath <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, Let no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> any <S%H3972>thing<s%> of the <S%H1697>business<s%> whereabout I <S%H7971>send<s%> thee, and what I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee: and I have <S%H3045>appointed<s%> my <S%H5288>servants<s%> to <S%H6423>such<s%> and <S%H492>such<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%>.

Now therefore what <S%H3426>is<s%> under thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>? <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H2568>five<s%> loaves of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in mine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, or what there is <S%H4672>present<s%>. present: Heb. found

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, There is no <S%H2455>common<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> under mine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, but there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H6944>hallowed<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>; if the young <S%H5288>men<s%> have <S%H8104>kept<s%> themselves at <S%H389>least<s%> from <S%H802>women<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Of a <S%H518>truth<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> have been <S%H6113>kept<s%> from us about these <S%H8032>three<s%> <S%H8543>days<s%>, since I came <S%H3318>out<s%>, and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the young <S%H5288>men<s%> are <S%H6944>holy<s%>, and the bread is in a <S%H1870>manner<s%> <S%H2455>common<s%>, yea, though it were <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> in the <S%H3627>vessel<s%>. yea: or, especially when this day there is other sanctified in the vessel

So the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H6944>hallowed<s%> bread: for there was no <S%H3899>bread<s%> there but the <S%H3899>shewbread<s%> <S%H6440><s%>, that was <S%H5493>taken<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H2527>hot<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when it was taken <S%H3947>away<s%>.

Now a certain <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was there that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H6113>detained<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and his <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H1673>Doeg<s%>, an <S%H130>Edomite<s%>, the <S%H47>chiefest<s%> of the <S%H7462>herdmen<s%> that belonged to <S%H7586>Saul<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%>, And is <S%H3426>there<s%> <S%H371>not<s%> here under thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H2595>spear<s%> or <S%H2719>sword<s%>? for I have neither <S%H3947>brought<s%> my <S%H2719>sword<s%> nor my <S%H3627>weapons<s%> with <S%H3027>me<s%>, because the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1697>business<s%> <S%H1961>required<s%> <S%H5169>haste<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H1555>Goliath<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, whom thou <S%H5221>slewest<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H425>Elah<s%>, behold, it is here <S%H3874>wrapped<s%> in a <S%H8071>cloth<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H646>ephod<s%>: if thou wilt <S%H3947>take<s%> that, <S%H3947>take<s%> it: for there is no <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H2108>save<s%> that <S%H2088>here<s%>. And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, There is none like that; <S%H5414>give<s%> it me.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H1272>fled<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> for <S%H6440>fear<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and <S%H935>went<s%> to <S%H397>Achish<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath<s%>.

And the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Is not this <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>? did they not <S%H6030>sing<s%> one to another of <S%H2088>him<s%> in <S%H4246>dances<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7586>Saul<s%> hath <S%H5221>slain<s%> his <S%H505>thousands<s%>, and <S%H1732>David<s%> his ten <S%H7233>thousands<s%>?

And <S%H1732>David<s%> laid <S%H7760>up<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> in his <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and was <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> <S%H397>Achish<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath<s%>.

And he <S%H8138>changed<s%> his <S%H2940>behaviour<s%> <S%H5869>before<s%> them, and feigned himself <S%H1984>mad<s%> in their <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and <S%H8427>scrabbled<s%> on the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, and let his <S%H7388>spittle<s%> fall <S%H3381>down<s%> upon his <S%H2206>beard<s%>. scrabbled: or, made marks

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H397>Achish<s%> unto his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, Lo, ye <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H7696>mad<s%>: wherefore then have ye <S%H935>brought<s%> him to me? is mad: or, playeth the mad man

Have I <S%H2638>need<s%> of mad <S%H7696>men<s%>, that ye have <S%H935>brought<s%> this fellow to play the mad <S%H7696>man<s%> in my presence? shall this fellow <S%H935>come<s%> into my <S%H1004>house<s%>?
